sentences.english: A rigid outboard support system negates spindle deflection.
sentences.chinese: 僵化的舷外支持系統的否定主軸偏轉。

sentences.english: Polish the crosshead pin to mirror surface.
In this article, the spindle units made by FAG (Germany) and SKF (Sweden) are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了德國FAG和瑞典SKF公司的主軸單元。

sentences.english: Finally, the measures to reduce the radial circle run-out error of the crankshaft main journal have be presented.
sentences.chinese: 最後提出了減小曲軸主軸頸徑向圓跳動誤差的措施。

sentences.english: Variable Frequency Motor conveys the power through belt drive and a set of transmission gears.
sentences.chinese: 變頻電機通過帶傳動和變速齒輪爲主軸提供動力。

sentences.english: Sports was the main shaft of the bodily-kinesthetic intelligence in PE.
sentences.chinese: 運動爲肢體動覺智慧體育教學之主軸。
顯著均衡的3馬力主軸電機。

sentences.english: It controls spindle motor rotation and heads movements.
sentences.chinese: 它控制主軸馬達轉動和磁頭運動。

sentences.english: Digital display device or grinding head of electric spindle can be provided according to custom's request.
sentences.chinese: 根據用戶需求，可提供數顯裝置，電主軸磨頭裝置。
運輸安裝主軸的控制桿。
主軸鼻子上金格里米勒。

sentences.english: Low noise low tremble water-cooled electric spindle.
sentences.chinese: 採用內藏式水冷高速電主軸，低噪音，低震動。

sentences.english: You can adjust the speed of spindle and feeding randomly during the operation.
sentences.chinese: 操作中可任意變換主軸轉速及進刀速度。

sentences.english: The fixed position on delivering axis and height of the striking board had the best value.
sentences.chinese: 打板在主軸上的安裝位置和打板高度均有最佳值。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the methods of measuremenf or the spindle rotation accuracy of gea machine-tools be established.
sentences.chinese: 建議制定齒輪機牀主軸迴轉精度檢驗規範。
